item.title: Keep only complete rows with no NA values
item.description: Keep only complete rows (omit any row with NA values) dt <- dt[complete.cases(dt)] dt <- dt %>% .[complete.cases(.)]

item.title: Remove rows with all NA
item.description: Remove rows with all NA but keep any row with at least 1 observation: dt <- dt[rowSums(is.na(x)) <= 1] dt <- dt %>% .[rowSums(is.na(.)) <= 1]

item.title: Split a data.table into a list by row number
item.description: Split a data.table into a list by row. Each row element then becomes an element in the list. dt <- dt[, row_id := .I] listy <- split(dt, dt$row_id)

item.title: Add linear regression to ggplot2
item.description: Add a simple linear regression line to ggplot scatter plot: plot <- ggplot(data = z, aes(x = xx, y = yy)) + geom_point(aes(colour = var), alpha = val) + geom_smooth(method = "lm", colour = "black", se = FALSE)
